title: Chloe Ferry left 'hurt' as she attempts to rescue injured pigeon on night out
text:

Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry could have fooled many into thinking she volunteered for the RSPCA over the weekend.

The MTV party girl, 24, shared of her "hurt" after stumbling across an injured pigeon during a night out and took to her Instagram stories to divulge her plans to get the winged animal to safety.

The surgically-enhanced star told her fans that she had ordered a taxi for the wounded bird after seeing the feathered friend laying on a windowsill as she walked along the streets of Newcastle.

In her first update, the blonde revealed: "I’ve come out tonight and something has really hurt us, this pigeon is injured so I physically rang the taxi service to pick the pigeon up and take it to my friend’s house, my mum's friend’s house, she looks after birds."

(Image: Instagram)

She continued: "Her name is Tracy and she is amazing,’ she added – of her friends, not the bird – before revealing her new winged friend would be getting a taxi straight to Tracy’s."

It was not long before Chloe's plan was scuppered as she then shared in another video: "Update on the f***ing pigeon," she said, "I got the girl who looks after the birds to ring the taxi driver and warn the driver there was a pigeon coming in the car."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Explaining what happened next, the reality TV personality added: "So I went to go and meet the driver about the pigeon and I went 'are you here to pick the pigeon up?' and he went 'what f***ing pigeon?' and I said, 'the pigeon I called you about', and he said 'is it in a box?' ‘And I said “'no it’s injured!' and so we’re back to square one as the taxi driver has f***ed off so I have no one to pick the pigeon up."

The star is yet to give another update on the pigeons status.

Chloe's animal rescue attempt comes after her ex beau Sam Gowland had his tattoo tribute to her covered up.

The former Love Islander, 24, had the Geordie Shore babe's visage painted on his thigh which is now hidden underneath a new inking of a roaring bear.

(Image: xxxxxx/Instagram)

Proving he is over his surgically-enhanced former flame, Sam took to Instagram on Thursday, to show off his new artwork, which he captioned: "Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending."

Sam first got the tattoo when he and Chloe appeared on MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us in November last year.

Chloe admitted that she decided on the design in order to stop Sam from being able to pull other girls.
description: The Geordie Shore star tried to arrange a taxi for her feathered friend after finding it injured on a windowsill
